title: Daily Life at Hogwarts - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mystery   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Confident Protagonist   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   System Administrator   Transmigration   Younger Sisters
author: 键盘上的懒猫
description: Albert has never had any big ambitions. He has always thought of himself as a salted fish. He was reborn and turned on the panel cheat sheet. This is the proper way to become a winner in life. When Albert was planning to make a salted fish with a goal, the Owl sent an invitation from Hogwarts, and he realized that he had traveled to the world of Harry Potter novels. Now, Albert is considering how to be a dreamy salted fish in the magic world>
